sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Box, Button, Grid, Card, CardContent, TextField } from '@mui/material';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import HeroSection from '../components/HeroSection';
import ContactForm from '../components/ContactForm';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <>
      <HeroSection />
      <Container sx={{ py: 12 }}>
        {/* About Us */}
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 12 }}>
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom color="text.primary">
            Innovate with Confidence
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary" sx={{ maxWidth: '800px', mx: 'auto' }}>
            Hono Technology delivers world-class IT services, blending expertise with cutting-edge Zvertex AI technology to empower businesses and redefine possibilities.
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        {/* Services */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 12 }}>
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom align="center" color="text.primary">
            Our Core Services
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {[
              { title: 'Digital Transformation', desc: 'Modernize your operations with tailored IT strategies.' },
              { title: 'AI & Data Analytics', desc: 'Harness data for actionable insights and growth.' },
              { title: 'Cloud Solutions', desc: 'Scalable, secure cloud infrastructure for all.' },
              { title: 'Cybersecurity', desc: 'Protect your business with advanced security.' },
            ].map((service) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={service.title}>
                <Card>
                  <CardContent>
                    <Typography variant="h6" color="primary">{service.title}</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">{service.desc}</Typography>
                  </CardContent>
                </Card>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        {/* Call to Action */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            bgcolor: 'accent.main',
            color: 'white',
            py: 10,
            textAlign: 'center',
            borderRadius: 3,
            mb: 12,
          }}
        >
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom>
            Ready to Transform Your Business?
          </Typography>
          <Button variant="contained" color="secondary" component={Link} to="/contact" size="large">
            Get in Touch
          </Button>
        </Box>

        {/* Newsletter */}
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 12 }}>
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom color="text.primary">
            Join Our Community
          </Typography>
          <Box component="form" sx={{ maxWidth: '600px', mx: 'auto', display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
            <TextField
              label="Your Email"
              variant="outlined"
              fullWidth
              sx={{ bgcolor: 'white' }}
            />
            <Button variant="contained" color="secondary" size="large">
              Subscribe
            </Button>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Container>
      <ContactForm />
    </>
  );
};

export default Home;
